    • Method Detail

      • device

        public final BleDevice device()
        The device undergoing the state change.

      • macAddress

        public final java.lang.String macAddress()
        Convience to return the mac address of device().

      • gattStatus

        public final int gattStatus()
        The change in gattStatus that may have precipitated the state change, or BleStatuses.GATT_STATUS_NOT_APPLICABLE. For example if State.ChangeEvent.didEnter(State) with BleDeviceState.DISCONNECTED is true and State.ChangeEvent.didExit(State) with BleDeviceState.CONNECTING is also true then gattStatus() may be greater than zero and give some further hint as to why the connection failed.

        See BleNode.ConnectionFailListener.ConnectionFailEvent.gattStatus() for more information.

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
